author: planttheidea
description: Think local, act global. State management for modern JS apps.
name: diviso

scripts.copy: shx cp -r dist/src dist/esm && shx cp -r dist/*.d.ts dist/esm
scripts.dist: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run copy && npm run patch:esm-ts
scripts.patch:esm-ts: node -e "require('shelljs').find('dist/esm/**/*.d.ts').forEach(f=>require('fs').copyFileSync(f,f.replace(/\.ts$/,'.mts')))"; shx sed -i "s/ from '(\..*)';$/ from '\$1.mjs';/" 'dist/esm/**/*.d.mts'; shx sed -i "s/^declare module '(\..*)'/declare module '\$1.mjs'/" 'dist/esm/**/*.d.mts'
